# Daily Upload Checklist

- [ ] Saved Packet Tracer lab to the correct `topology/` folder (if used)
- [ ] Saved raw config(s) to `configs/`
- [ ] Saved verification output to `verification/`
- [ ] Updated section `README.md` (if needed)
- [ ] Updated `failure-notes.md` with at least one failure/fix
- [ ] Commit message describes the artifact (what + why)
